title_sort: john w. wiggins, jr. to walt whitman, 24 march 1888
title: John W. Wiggins, Jr. to Walt Whitman, 24 March 1888
creator_sort: John W. Wiggins, Jr.; Walt Whitman
text: Autograph of Whitmanâ€” (see over) crdBrooklyn N.Y.March 24/88Dear Mr WhitmanMy father and other members of the "Society of Old Brooklynites" are anxious to receive a line, or to ask from you, to read at their annual dinner on the 9th brox, and have requested me to write to you, and beg the favor. I am afraid from what I have noticed in the papers, that you have not been in good health of late, but I trust that you are now strong again, and able to give the old friends of your youth a line from your gifted pen, on this, as well as many future annual reunions.With sincere regardsVery Respectfully YoursJohn W. Wiggins Jr. John W. Wiggins, Jr. to Walt Whitman, 24 March 1888
